creator: fabian.ritzmann@Sun.COM
text:
The web.xml ought to have a default MIME mapping as described in <http://www.w3.org/TR/ws-
policy/#media-type>:

MIME media type name:
application

MIME subtype name:
wspolicy+xml

Required parameters:
none

Optional parameters:
charset

...

Additional information:

File extension:
wspolicy

creator: fabian.ritzmann@Sun.COM
text:
Created attachment 21204
Patch for conf/web.xml that adds application/wspolicy+xml mime type mapping

Patch for conf/web.xml that adds application/wspolicy+xml mime type mapping

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text:
patch applied to trunk

proposed for 6.0

text:
